empty.question: What is a location?
empty.answer: Locations allow the nation to keep track of the number of visitors in real-time (optional). It also allows the users of Nationskollen to easily find the nations different locations using the map. You can also add opening hours, as well as food- and drink-menus. Events that are created can also be linked to a location.
